### Performance Optimization (2026-01-21)

**What**: Fixed inline arrow functions in onClick handlers to use memoized callbacks across 4 components, preventing unnecessary re-renders.

**Files Optimized**:
- `web/src/components/dashboard/BackToDashboardButton.tsx` - Memoized navigation handler
- `web/src/components/dashboard/ProviderSetupPanel.tsx` - Created callback factory for save buttons  
- `web/src/components/workflows/WorkflowToolbar.tsx` - Memoized 3 handlers (tag toggle, sort by date/name)
- `web/src/components/assets/AssetTree.tsx` - Memoized folder toggle and click handlers

**Impact**: High - particularly for WorkflowToolbar which is always visible with frequently-opened menus.

**Pattern Applied**: Callback factories `useCallback((param) => () => { handler(param) }, [handler])` to prevent new closures on every render.

**Verification**: ✅ TypeScript passes (web, electron), ✅ ESLint passes
